when "000000000000000000" => rgb <= "000011";
when "000000000000000001" => rgb <= "000011";
when "000000000000000010" => rgb <= "000011";
when "000000000000000011" => rgb <= "000011";
when "000000001000000011" => rgb <= "000011";
when "000000010000000001" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000010000000010" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000010000000011" => rgb <= "000011";
when "000000010000000100" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000010000000101" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000011000000000" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000011000000001" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000011000000010" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000011000000011" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000011000000100" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000011000000101" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000011000000110" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000011000000111" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000100000000000" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000100000000001" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000100000000010" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000100000000011" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000100000000100" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000100000000101" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000100000000110" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000100000000111" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000101000000000" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000101000000001" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000101000000010" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000101000000011" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000101000000100" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000101000000101" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000101000000110" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000101000000111" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000110000000001" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000110000000010" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000110000000011" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000110000000100" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000110000000101" => rgb <= "110000";
when "000000110000000110" => rgb <= "110000";
when others => rgb <= "000000";
